TopicTitle: Change contract requirement from "stage" to "stage or activate"

Articles.Content: I have had alot of my missions invalidated since i clicked "activate" instead of staging a parachute, sure its mostly my fault but im surprised its even a thing! There should not be a difference in activating and staging in my opinion!
Other methods for activating parts is coming later, only stage activating made it in for 0.24
you can change staging in-flight, and stage an already-activated part.
